src:
Review Single
Kekuatan Panic! At The Disco di Lagu Tema 'Frozen 2'
05 Nov 2019, 16:36 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Panic! At The Disco membawakan lagu tema film 'Frozen 2' bertajuk 'Into The Unknown' dengan gaya baru. (Kevin Winter/Getty Images for CBS Radio Inc./AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Panic! At The Disco merilis 'Into The Unknown', sebuah lagu tema dari sekuel film Disney yang akan datang bertajuk 'Frozen 2'. Lagu ini juga menjadi bagian dalam album tema resmi dari film yang dijadwalkan tayang pada 20 November mendatang di Indonesia.Dalam versi terbaru, Into The Unknown ditampilkan memiliki riff gitar dan latar vokal yang membuat lagu jadi lebih megah. Aransemen itu ditambah dengan instrumen tiup dan gesek, serta kekuatan suara sang vokalis, Brendon Urie, yang lancar memainkan nada-nada tinggi.Dibawakan oleh Panic! At The Disco, Into The Unknown jadi terasa memiliki jiwa yang berbeda. 'Rasa' animasi Disney baru terasa lagi di bagian akhir, di mana sang vokalis mempertahankan nada tinggi sampai tuntas."Everyone I've ever loved is here within these walls // I'm sorry secret siren, but I'm blocking out your calls // I've had my adventure // I don't need something new // I'm afraid of what I'm risking if I follow you // Into the unknown," lantun Urie.



Sementara dalam versi asli, lagu yang dinyanyikan Idina Menzel lewat karakter Elsa itu didominasi oleh alunan instrumental yang dimainkan orkestra.Sebelum merilis lagu tersebut, Panic! At The Disco terlebih dahulu membagikan sejumlah potret kala merekam Into The Unknown."Bersantai di studio sambil merekam Into The Unknown untuk Disney Frozen 2," tulis mereka dalam keterangan unggahan tersebut.



Selain Panic! At The Disco, sejumlah musisi lain juga akan mengisi album tema Frozen 2. Di antaranya, Weezer yang akan menyanyikan ulang Lost In The Woods, juga Kacey Musgraves dengan lagu All Is Found. (agn/rea)
text:
Single Review
Panic Power! At The Disco in the 'Frozen 2' Theme Song
05 Nov 2019, 16:36 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Panic! At The Disco performed the movie theme song 'Frozen 2' titled 'Into The Unknown' with a new style. (Kevin Winter / Getty Images for CBS Radio Inc./AFP)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Panic! At The Disco released 'Into The Unknown', a theme song from the upcoming Disney movie sequel titled 'Frozen 2'. This song is also part of the official theme album of the film which is scheduled to air on November 20 in Indonesia. In the latest version, Into The Unknown is shown to have guitar riffs and vocal backgrounds that make the song more majestic. The arrangement was added with wind and string instruments, and the sound power of the vocalist, Brendon Urie, who smoothly played high notes. Bringed by Panic! At The Disco, Into The Unknown feels like having a different soul. The 'feel' of the new Disney animation is felt again at the end, where the vocalist maintains the high notes to the finish. "Everyone I've ever loved is here within these walls // calls // I've had my adventure // I don't need anything new // I'm afraid of what I'm risking if I follow you // Into the unknown, "Urie said.



While in the original version, the song sung by Idina Menzel through the Elsa character was dominated by the instrumental strains played by the orchestra. Before releasing the song, Panic! At The Disco first shared a number of portraits when recording Into The Unknown, "Relaxing in the studio while recording Into The Unknown for Disney Frozen 2," they wrote in the description of the upload.



Besides Panic! At The Disco, a number of other musicians will also be filling the theme album Frozen 2. Among them, Weezer who will sing the Lost In The Woods, also Kacey Musgraves with the song All Is Found. (agn / rea)
